name: GitHub Actions: npm audit CI
description: Run npm audit and fail on vulnerabilities.

files.template:
name: npm audit

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  audit:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm audit --audit-level=high
